songs.title: Get Sprayed
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Yeah
It’s the anticipation, the whole world is waiting on me
It’s like a gangster celebration we taking on it
From the scales to the charts
Posted bail, coke sales, hammers in the park
Perceived we were smart cause we flipped it to the flow
Now it’s overnight flights just to get to the show
It’s L-O-X  D Block, you already know
The suckers hating on me while we steady getting dough (get it)
Now who’s next to blow
Yeah that kid that been here, snitches tenth fear
Sorta like Big when he slid, you can’t win here
Revolver style, filling the chamber let him spin there
Bullets all up in your face burning your chin head (yeah)
We been prepared, ya’ll been scared
We bumping to the Autoworld Dallas sun store, I run the room
(Yeah, D Block)
Protect mine’s, check lines, we run the crew
No security, go through homie it’s kinda sure yeah

[Verse 2]
Now I’m in a Range but I been a thg since my big whale
Yeah I signed with Puff but that wasn’t my first deal
Cocaine birds fly south to Nashville
Smack, you ain’t the only motherfucker that roadkill
Little digital scales and triple beans
I wake up and buy it nigga, no more dreams
I thug and I’m balling hookers like Hakeems
But I’m loyal I don’t go to different teams (D Block)
You know these niggas is bitch made
They been telling on niggas since fifth grade
Anything I get on nigga ain’t get played
I ride for my nigga, talk shit and get sprayed

[Verse 3]
Yeah we don’t fuck with you thot
Really your money and guns too short
Fucking with me you’re dealing with the nucleus of New York
Sedan only two door, my stick name is the shooter
You can’t figure out how I manoeuvre
I went with the choices the Effen or the Ruda
Trumped out down on the west end with the [?]
Lights on, sips on Merlot Hookah
Trips back and forth out of town, my little trooper
Rocks on us, the hot corners
We was putting work in when you was playing pop on ‘em
Yeah, handgun on switchblade
I ride for my nigga, talk shit and you get sprayed

[Verse 4]
Bob shop, bamboo full of bubblegum
Busting in a Bimmer or Benz when I’m bubbling
Break it down, the fudder at the base spot
The [?] on a bitch with a body like BayWatch
Basically I body you broad day
Bi-polar bigga that’s broader than Broadway
Listen B, I’m just trying to give you my history
Laid back nigga but my nerves make me jittery
Bird fly, bullets delivered to ‘em
For a right amount of money know niggas will rid of me
So I hustle and get paid
I ride for my nigga, talk shit and you get sprayed

[Outro]
It’s the anticipation, the whole world is waiting on me (waiting on me)
It’s like a gangster celebration we taking on it
It’s the anticipation, the whole world is waiting on me (waiting on me)
It’s like a gangster celebration we taking on it
